price: 4. Waxaanu u diyaarinnay gaalada silsilado, heegayaal, iyo dab ololaya.
arabic: إِنَّآ أَعۡتَدۡنَا لِلۡكَٰفِرِينَ سَلَٰسِلَاْ وَأَغۡلَٰلٗا وَسَعِيرًا

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: innā aʿtadnā lil'kāfirīna salāsilā wa-aghlālan wasaʿīran
